decks.notes: This deck focuses on aggressive creatures that can quickly overwhelm the opponent with direct damage and powerful abilities. It includes a mix of creatures with abilities that can deal damage, generate card advantage, and provide ramp. The deck aims to establish a board presence early on and maintain pressure throughout the game. By efficiently playing creatures and using removal spells, the deck seeks to outpace the opponent and secure victory through aggressive tactics.

The main concept of this deck is to deploy small, aggressive creatures early in the game and boost them with powerful enchantments such as Ethereal Armor. The deck also aims to disrupt the opponent's strategy with cards like Rest in Peace and No More Lies, while generating card advantage with Enduring Curiosity and Proft's Eidetic Memory. This deck is designed to quickly build a board presence and overwhelm the opponent with efficient creatures and disruptive spells, ultimately leading to a fast victory.

The deck focuses on playing multiple spells to gain advantage while controlling the board with powerful spells like Day of Judgment. The key combo involves playing Omniscience to cast Roiling Dragonstorm for massive damage, alongside other spells like Repair and Recharge to keep the engine going. Marang River Regent and other creatures provide additional pressure, while Scrollshift and Stock Up help to set up the combo. The deck also includes disruptive cards like Get Lost and No More Lies to disrupt the opponent's game plan.

This deck focuses on utilizing a combination of aggressive creatures and powerful spells to quickly overwhelm the opponent. By efficiently utilizing mana and synergizing with each other, the creatures in the deck can deal significant damage in the early game, while the spells provide additional support and removal options. The inclusion of cards like Amalia Benavides Aguirre and Raise the Past showcase the deck's ability to leverage graveyard interactions to gain an advantage. Overall, this Orzhov Aggro deck aims to apply pressure from multiple angles and maintain control of the battlefield throughout the game.
